text:
CONFIDENCE IN THE GOVERNMENT DURING THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC

Please read the statements below and for each select the response that best reflects your opinion. There are no right or wrong answers.

Key:
1=Strongly disagree
2=Disagree
3=Slightly disagree
4=Neither agree nor disagree
5=Slightly agree
6=Agree
7=Strongly agree
The government have done their best in supplying PPE throughout the covid-19 crisis.
The government has not implemented clear and well set out measures to control the virus spread.
The government has set out clear, consistent public messaging of the rules for covid-19.
The Government have fear mongered the public about Covid-19.
Stronger measures should have been put into place to allow students to return to university after the first covid-19 lockdown.
The Government have used its resources effectively in protecting and supporting the NHS during the pandemic.
The government work in the best interest of the public.
The government generally acts in a consistent and predictable manner.
The government does not address the needs and expectations of the public.
The government act openly and honestly with the public at all times.
The government is corrupt it has no integrity.
